description: Miss Minchin is the headmistress of the Miss Minchin Select Seminary for Young Ladies (Minchin Kishuku Joshi Gakuin (ミンチン寄宿女子学院)) where most of the story takes place. She is very fond of money, and thus treats the girls that have money-spending parents behind them with a very friendly manner. Sara lost her graces with Miss Minchin, when the money stopped coming due to the events that took place.
name: Maria Minchin
